title: Robert Earl Keen Delves Into Bluegrass With A Texan Twang
teaser: The singer-songwriter usually follows in the story-song tradition of his forebears Townes Van Zant and Guy Clark. But in Happy Prisoner he brings enthusiastic curiosity to covers of bluegrass greats.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
